meanings.definition: The act of making something political.
meanings.sent1: The politicizations of school events led to heated debates among parents.
meanings.sent2: The politicizations of the budget allocation caused delays in decision-making.
meanings.sent3: The politicizations of choosing the class pet resulted in a fierce argument.
meanings.sent4: The politicizations of the family dinner turned it into a battleground of opinions.
meanings.sent5: The politicizations of the city council meeting made it feel like a political rally.

meanings.definition: The process of bringing something under political control or influence.
meanings.sent1: The politicizations of the media affected the way news was reported.
meanings.sent2: The politicizations of the company policies changed the work environment.
meanings.sent3: The politicizations of the lunch menu made everyone choose sides.
meanings.sent4: The politicizations of the neighborhood watch turned it into a political entity.
meanings.sent5: The politicizations of the school board meeting made it feel like a government session.
